snippet.title: REC - OFFICIAL TRAILER 2 (GAMEPLAY GRAPHICAL IMPROVEMENTS) (OLD)
snippet.description:
Graphical improvements have been made since the first gameplay trailer! Don't miss every single update on my official discord! Link in bio!

REC is a game that is being developed by a single developer, which will give you a totally free, hyper-realistic experience of a war where the country that is thought to be the victim turns out to have a plan to cause a nuclear war, so the player he will need to eliminate all the enemies that stand in his way to save humanity as we know it, can the world count on you?
ATTENTION, THIS IS A PURE FANTASY GAME AND DOES NOT SUPPORT ANY WAR
